compression.success: Chat history compressed from {{original}} to {{new}} tokens.
compression.failedSmall: Compression was not beneficial for this history size.
compression.failedLarge: Chat history compression did not reduce size. This may indicate issues with the compression prompt.
compression.tokenCountError: Could not compress chat history due to a token counting error.
compression.emptySummary: Chat history compression failed: the model returned an empty summary.

options.allowServerSession: Allow all server tools for this session
options.allowToolFuture: Allow tool for all future sessions

questions.allowMcp: Allow execution of MCP tool "{{tool}}" from server "{{server}}"?

body.closeEditorToContinue: Save and close external editor to continue
